issue.title: [Python] Pull latest docker manylinux1 image
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2114?focusedCommentId=16356908) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
`[~wesmckinn]` These changes are minimal and only an artifact of the docker maintenance. Are you ok when in future I don't make tickets for them? (They shouldn't show up in the changelog)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2114?focusedCommentId=16357121) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Sounds good to me, no need to create JIRAs for Docker image maintenance

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2114?focusedCommentId=16357421) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1577
